text: Shadow of the Hegemon (2001) is the second book in the Ender's Shadow series (also called the Bean Quartet) by Orson Scott Card. It is also the sixth book in the Ender's Game series. It is told mostly from the point of view of Bean, a mostly minor character in the first novel Ender's Game. ==Other webs== * About the novel Shadow of the Hegemon from Card's website Category:Ender's Game (novel series) Category:2001 books
